attributes.action: Let all Gerkha's stay in our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Around 3,500 Gurkhas from Nepal currently serve in the British Army, in Iraq and Afghanistan. Some 200,000 fought in World War I and World War II and more than 45,000 in total have died serving Britain. Let alone the many more protecting our country not there own but our for many years to come. Not letting them stay in our country is an insult to every gurkah who has and is protecting our shores 24/7

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
